next.excerpt:
The last 6 months, my SLYV allocation has been zooming up. The link below is a
chart of SLYV vs. SPY vs QQQ. I thought small caps suffer in a rising interest
rate regime. I have no idea why small-cap value is doing so well, but would like
to understand.

I only have 4% of my total portfolio…
